name: Steampunk Runner
description:
A 2D runner in which you have to control a flying hero with a mouse. The player moves constantly up, the van needs to avoid various obstacles by flying around them. There are two shops in the game: the Potions Shop and the Wings Shop, but remember that they are closed at night, but you can fly as much as you like. Collect coins, buy new wings and upgrade potions. Summer. In a flying city where there is not enough grass, water and clean air, the most sought-after and dangerous profession is guarding and patrolling the borders. Everyone wants the boy to be in the best kit, and our hero did not rule it out.



While school is on summer break, he looks up and learns the art of flying. Higher and higher, but constantly confronted with research, he exceeds the height.

There are two shops in the game: the Potions Shop and the Wings Shop, but remember that they are closed at night, but you can fly as much as you like.

Peculiarities:
- nice graphics;
- simple management;
- interesting gameplay;
